detail_desc: Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a rounded collar, button placket and a gathered seam at the waist.

Shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Top in embroidered sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved dress, pair of trousers and a hairband in soft, organic cotton jersey. Dress with press-studs on the shoulders. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elastication around the heels. Hairband with a large bow at the front and covered elastication at the back.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the back and crotch. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the back.

Briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. The briefs are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit.

Strapless bandeau bra in jersey with padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, ribbed trim at the hem and no fasteners. The bra is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.

Fitted top in sturdy, stretch fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Joggers in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Regular waist with covered elastication and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

Single-breasted jacket in a lightweight weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a lightweight weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Slim Fit – a fit that shapes in at the chest and tapers at the waist. This, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Jacket in a cotton and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a stand-up collar. Concealed press-studs and a zip down the front, a yoke at the back, front pockets and two inner pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable concealed press-stud fastening at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Lined.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and adjustable tabs with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an extended waistband with a button, zip fly and adjustable tabs with buttons at the sides. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Pyjamas with a T-shirt and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a text print on the front and ribbing around the neckline. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt top with a round neckline. Flannel bottoms with an elasticated waist and fake fly.

Fitted jacket in soft velvet made from recycled polyester. Deep V-neck, a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front and jetted front pockets. Decorative covered buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Grosgrain belt with a decorative appliqué made from recycled sparkly stones and beads, and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening.
